Whereupon I was torn into parts by a hundred voices,—each of them pitched in a different arrondisement…I says, ‘sea level and atmospheric pressure and topography make all the difference in the world!’ My voice cracked on the word ‘difference,’ soaring up so divinely, and I said: ‘If you think certain things do not show from what district they come, yea, even to an arrondisement, then you are not out gunning for particular game, but simply any catch, and I’ll have nothing to do with you!’”
